overview: Jahannavi tends to make decisions based on logic and feels comfortable knowing all of the details.
Jahannavi is likely a natural problem-solver: perceptive, analytical, and detail-oriented.
Jahannavi tends to be pragmatic, reliable, and very organized.
Jahannavi tends to be thorough and thrives when there is a difficult problem.
Jahannavi may sometimes communicate literally, focusing on clear information rather than ambiguous emotions.
